item.title: AO Archive: Debugging a NuGet Package
item.description: https://spin.atomicobject.com/2018/01/29/debugging-nuget-package/ This was one of the first blog posts I wrote while working at Atomic Object. It explains how to debug NuGet packages locally, which can be a little when you’re working with DLL’s.
